page.title: 09LOCHGOILHEAD-LIFESTYLES(2)
page.content: Population Categories {b) Permanent Residents-Incomers The majority of permanent residents are incomers who are living here because of work or for easy access to their place of work outwith the village. {c) Second Home-Weekend Residents These are caravan,chalet or second home owners.Several people from this category have become permanent residents. The development of the village social structure is directly influenced by group "c".Catering for tourist and holiday requirements has established the type of facilities available in the village.(i.e.Hotels,restaurant, craftshop and extensive recreational facilities.)
